get.description:
This resource specifies certificate revocation lists as X.509 objects.
Retrieves crl data.

delete.description:
Deletes the CRL data.
When DELETE is used without query parameters, the entire CRL resource is deleted.
When DELETE uses a query value naming the crlid, only the matched entry is deleted.

parameters.description: Delete the CRL identified by the string containing CRL ID.
parameters.name: subject

204.description: The CRL instance or the the entire CRL resource has been successfully deleted.

crlid.description: Local reference to a crl resource

id.description: Instance ID of this specific resource

if.description: The interface set supported by this resource

thisupdate.description: UTC time of last CRL update
